description: This file defines the `BookingsService` class, which provides methods to interact with a backend API for creating bookings. It includes functionality to send HTTP POST requests with booking details and handle responses or exceptions.

classes.name: BookingsService
classes.description: A service class responsible for communication with backend booking API, including creating new bookings.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Creates a new booking by sending booking details to the backend API and returns a `Booking` object upon success.

methods.name: _formatDate
methods.description: Formats a `DateTime` object into a string in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format.
